data.title: Company History
data.meta_description: Wipro Consumer Care is part of the Wipro group, a global IT and Consumer goods major with headquarters in Bangalore, India, that comes with overs 75 years of
data.text:
Wipro Consumer Care is part of the Wipro group, a global IT and Consumer goods major with headquarters in Bangalore, India, that comes with overs 75 years of rich history. A group with a trusting leadership, practicing diversity and inclusion and hungry for growth. It has a Global workforce of 10,000 + with offices in more than 19 countries. 59% of the workforce consists of women employees

Wipro Unza Africa-and-overseas is a division of the Wipro Consumer Care group, dedicated to marketing a comprehensive range of personal care products. Our offerings primarily include Fragrances, Talcum Powder, Deodorants, Skin Care, Hair care, Shower and Cleansing products. We have established a significant presence in Africa-and-overseas markets, with a strong foothold in regions such as Africa, the Indian sub-continent, and Australasia. Our products are proudly presented under renowned brand names like Enchanteur, Romano, Santoor, Gervenne Bouquet, Doremi, Carrie Junior, Eversoft, and Aiken. These brands stand alongside other leading names within Wiproâ€™s diverse portfolio.

Many of our brands enjoy positions of market leadership owing to the fact that they are specifically designed and created with consumer needs in mind. The enduring success of our brands are built on an unwavering commitment to high standards and values, enabling us to provide high-quality products for generations.

Milestones
